description: A React functional component called 'Certifications' that displays a list of certification items within a styled card layout. The component imports React, a CyberCard component, utility icons, and styles, then renders each certification with appropriate icons, name, issuer, and optional year.

methods.name: Certifications({ items = [] })
methods.description: A React functional component that takes a list of certification objects and displays them within a styled card layout.
